attributes.text:
@dev Calculate remaining blocks left according to current reward supply and rate
 Useful for contract owner to either re-supply or migrate to an alternate reward solution

devdoc.details: Implementation of Reward logic for KEYFI token, based on SushiSwap's MasterChef.

addStakingToken(uint256,address,uint16).details: adds a token to the list of allowed staking tokens

params._allocPoint: — The "weight" of this token in relation to other allowed tokens.
params._depositFeeBP: — deposit fee basis points to be deducted on each deposit

checkpoint(uint256).details: Calculates all reward rates for all staking tokens since last checkpoint.  Should be called before any balance-changing operations (e.g. deposit, withdraw)

params._pid: — The index of the token in the array of staking tokens

params._amount: — The amount of tokens to be staked
params._token: — The staking token to be deposited

emergencyWithdraw(address).details: withdraw all staked funds of a given token, regardless of reward logic To be used in an emergency case if reward logic fails and tokens would get locked otherwise

params._token: — The staking token to withdraw funds from

getMultiplier(uint256,uint256).details: gets multiplier factor for possible bonuses within any given period

massUpdateTokens().details: invokes a checkpoint update on all staking tokens in the list

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingReward(address,address).details: calculates pending reward for a given staking token and a user

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rewardBlocksLeft().details: Calculate remaining blocks left according to current reward supply and rate Useful for contract owner to either re-supply or migrate to an alternate reward solution

setAllocPoint(address,uint256,uint16).details: changes the weight allocation for a particular token

params._allocPoint: — The allocation points set to this token

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(address,uint256).details: withdraw _amount of a given staking token

params._amount: — The amount of tokens to withdraw
params._token: — The staking token to be withdrawn

devdoc.title: RewardPool
